FixOnce_e3921f743904.name: FixOnce
FixOnce_e3921f743904.summary: FixOnce is a persistent memory layer for AI coding assistants (Claude Code, Cursor). It remembers decisions, solutions, insights, and context across sessions so AI never forgets previous work.
FixOnce_e3921f743904.stack: Python 3, Flask, FastMCP (MCP protocol), Chrome Extension (JS), NumPy, scikit-learn (TF-IDF embeddings), SQLite, JSON storage
FixOnce_e3921f743904.current_goal: Windows packaging complete - ready for testing on real Windows machine

last_insight.text: OpenAI adapter (openai_adapter.py) provides 8 functions: init_session, search_solutions, log_decision, log_avoid, update_goal, log_insight, get_context, get_browser_errors. Compatible with both old 'functions' and new 'tools' format.

tetris-game_57755ff050fb.name: tetris-game
tetris-game_57755ff050fb.summary: Classic Tetris game - single HTML file with embedded CSS and JavaScript
tetris-game_57755ff050fb.current_goal: Investigate and fix duplicate project ID bug in auto_init_session

last_insight.text: After fixing Python source files, must delete __pycache__/*.pyc files and restart server for changes to take effect
